content.prompt: The phylogenetic trees in Figures 2 and 3 depict two different phylogenies of the same populations of sticklebacks. Which of the following questions will best help determine which tree represents the most accurate phylogeny?

choices.label: Is the EDA gene as representative of the differences between the populations as the 25 random genes that were examined for Figure 3?
Are the low-plated populations found only in freshwater and the high-plated populations found only in saltwater environments?
Is the common ancestor of the organisms represented in Figure 2 different from the common ancestor of the organisms represented in Figure 3?
Is the expression level of the EDA gene analyzed in Figure 2 significantly greater than the expression levels of the 25 genes analyzed in Figure 3?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
